ch.unibe.iam.graph
Class Vertex

java.lang.Object
  ch.unibe.iam.graph.Attributes
      ch.unibe.iam.graph.GraphElement
          ch.unibe.iam.graph.Vertex
All Implemented Interfaces:
Attributable, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
DVertexHash, UVertexHash
public abstract class Vertex
extends GraphElement

Defines a common API for all vertices of a graph.

Version:
$Revision: 1.16 $ $Date: 2002/10/24 17:07:18 $
Author:
Pascal Habegger

isAdjacentTo

public abstract boolean isAdjacentTo(Vertex pVertex)
Returns true if vertex pVertex is adjacent to this vertex.

Parameters:
pVertex - Vertex to be used for adjacency test.
Returns:
true if vertex pVertex is adjacent to this vertex.

hasEdgeTo

public abstract boolean hasEdgeTo(Vertex pVertex)
Tests if this vertex has an edge with the specified vertex. The edge has to originate with this vertex (tail vertex) and point to the specified other vertex (head vertex).

Parameters:
pVertex - Head vertex of requested edge.
Returns:
true if an edge as specified exists, else false.

countEdgesTo

public abstract int countEdgesTo(Vertex pVertex)
Counts the number of edges pointing to the specified vertex and originating with this vertex.

Parameters:
pVertex - Destination vertex.
Returns:
Number of edges connecting this vertex with the specified vertex.
